page.title: 17GOVERNMENT * TRADE *RELIGION
page.content: { {GOVERNMENT} The Government pay for some of the school equipment like the VHS video. The Parochial is a Church Parish Council which decides what happens in the village like the flower festival. Lord Gage is in the house of Lords. He owns Firle Place but he does not live there. {TRADE The village shop is used for things people have forgotten.Only the elderly use it for their weekly shopping.Mot people do their shopping in Lewes. {RELIGION There are two churches in the area.St Peters in Firle and St Andrews in Beddingham.They are both Church of England and no other religions are represented in the area.
